name: Reave
description:
Dear Augustin, 

Since I first set a foot on this land, I had the occasion to glance peculiar moments and obscure indeed. I wouldn’t request your support if I was not frightened myself this much. Unfortunately, I ought to dwell in the mansion as I acquired it from my predecessors. Nevertheless, this residence is a candle to the devil. Thee must elucidate this peculiar event and what triggers it to put an end to the cursed mansion in other words find the clues. 

Yours sincerely,

Joseph Lister
